channel.title: Looping Background Music in a 317 [Delta]
channel.description:
I recently added background music to my server, but only plays once, then it end and doesn't play anymore. I don't have the normal Bluurs Client with the music tab, it just starts automatically. How can I make it loop around continuously? When I added the code for music, I used this tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=439745.0
I will [u]Rep+[/u] for the solution to this.
[b]- Excel4[/b]
